NaBFID is regulated by RBI as All India Financial Institution. , 2016 As the NaBFID is established as Development Financial Institution to support the development of long-term infrastructure financing, the exposure limits for the investments in this entity will be considered in line with the limits prescribed for Public Limited Infrastructure Investee Company under note 3 of the Regulation 9 of IRDAI(Investment) Regulations,2016.
